document.full_text: ericsson, the world's biggest mobile network equipment maker, gave a cautious outlook on thursday which sent its shares lower even though the firm stuck to sales and profit growth targets for the next three years.
document.title: ericsson's cautious outlook takes shine off shares
lines_and_colors: ericsson, the world's biggest mobile network equipment maker, gave a cautious outlook on thursday which sent its shares lower even though the firm stuck to sales and profit growth targets for the next three years.
